title: WTB: Cobb Red/Bat Off, WaJo Portrait

posts.post_title: WTB: Cobb Red/Bat Off, WaJo Portrait
posts.post_content:
Happy Friday everyone. 

Looking specifically to buy:

- Cobb (Red BG or Bat Off) in a SGC 1-2
- WaJo (Portrait) in a SGC 1-2
- Eddie Collins in a SGC 2-4

Also, just starting out on my T206 collection (and have many holes to fill) so generally interested in any other SGC HOFs so feel free to shoot what you have my way!

Thanks in advance!

-Wade
Bump to add William Otey old mill and Lajoie bat on shoulder. Thanks!
